attributes.additional_details:
The UK is the worst for Transport Fares in the World and every year in London the fares increase but never decrease ever. Eventually people will be spending more on fare going to work and will effect lower pay workers, which will then cause poverty eventually in London.Please sign this e-petition to Bring Transport Fares Down. And focus on making general living standards affordable by starting on Transport Fares.Feel free to spread this e-petition across the web with social media etc let's make a stand!

Thank You Oliver Houchen
